          "drawsContent": true,

              "children": [
                {
                  "bounds": [400, 400],
                  "children": [
                    {
                      "children": [
                        {
                          "bounds": [400, 400],
                          "children": [
                            {

                              "drawsContent": true,

                                  "bounds": [100, 100],

            }

      ]
    }
  ]
}

Frame: '<!--framePath //<!--frame0-->-->'
--------
{
  "bounds": [400, 400],
  "children": [
    {
      "bounds": [400, 400],
      "drawsContent": true,
      "backgroundColor": "#FF0000",
      "children": [
        {
          "position": [50, 50],
          "bounds": [100, 100],
          "contentsOpaque": true,
          "drawsContent": true,
